br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.model

Class Adventurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.model.Adventurer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdventurerListener, java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class Adventurer
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdventurerListener, java.io.Serializable
    Model class to be inherited by game characters as monsters, players, npcs, etc. No rpg game can exist without Adventurer, so this is the most important class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Limao Games
    Email: andreikeda@limaogames.com.br
    created on: Feb 1, 2014
    See Also:
    Advantage, AdventurerListener, Attribute, Job, Item, Race, Serializable, Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Adventurer.Gender
      enum used to index class' gender instances.
      static class  Adventurer.Status
      enum used to index class' status instances.

      • create

        public void create(long id,
          java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.String description,
          Adventurer.Gender gender,
          int age,
          int height,
          double weight,
          int xp,
          int ap,
          long score,
          long coins,
          Race race)
        Description copied from interface: AdventurerListener
        Creates instance of Adventurer.
        Specified by:
        create in interface AdventurerListener
        Parameters:
        id - - object's identifier.
        name - - object's name. It can be null, but it's not recommended.
        description - - object's description. It can be null.
        gender - - Adventurer.Gender type.
        age - - object's age. It must be bigger than 0.
        height - - object's height. It must be bigger than 0.
        weight - - object's weight. It must be bigger than 0.
        xp - - object's experience. It must be bigger than 0.
        ap - - object's ap experience. It must be bigger than 0.
        score - - object's score. It must be equal or bigger than 0.
        coins - - object's money. It must be bigger than 0.
        race - - object's Race instance. It cannot be null.

      • upgrade

        public boolean upgrade()
        Description copied from interface: AdventurerListener
        Method to upgrade a Job. This method only returns true if the actual Job instance has been set a nextJob variable. All the nextJob prerequisites must be satisfied.
        Specified by:
        upgrade in interface AdventurerListener
        Returns:
        Boolean true if Adventurer job has been upgraded or false otherwise.
